title: B18 Blankets sold Shanks Hummel Deal
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: B18 Blankets sold Shanks Hummel Deal
posts.post_content:
Here are two blankets for sale. The Shanks has the more difficult Brown pennants and has great registration and color. Very nice blanket
Hummel has the green infield and is a decent blanket with an uneven cut and some fading. Name is easy to read

HummelSold

5.99 shipping for one or both. Prices are net
